Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound  Reroute near Desplaines/Fulton
ShortDescription: Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Fulton Market, Clinton, Randolph, Desplaines, due to street blockage near Desplaines/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Fulton Market, Clinton, Randolph, Desplaines then resume their normal route on Milwaukee, due to street blockage near  Desplaines/Fulton.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive, #4 Cottage Grove Reroute near Michigan/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: #3 King Drive, #4 Cottage Grove, buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Roosevelt due street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive, #4 Cottage Grove, buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Roosevelt due street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Madison, State, and Roosevelt, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Roosevelt, State, Monroe, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffrey Jump Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: #J14 Jeffrey Jump, buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Roosevelt due street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffrey Jump, buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Roosevelt due street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, State, Madison, then resume their normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Washington, State, Roosevelt, then resume their normal route.

Headline: # 6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: # 6 Jackson Park Express, buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Roosevelt due street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
# 6 Jackson Park Express , buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Roosevelt due street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, State, Monroe, Michigan then resume their normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via State, Roosevelt, then resume their normal route.
